name: Monetas
description: Monetas is Multi-network, Multi-utility crypto currency which aims to make day-to-day use cases possible with crypto-currencies. Monetas also has developed a Multi-utility wallet application for the same, called 'Indus91 Wallet'. MNTG is also trying to partner-up with leading games in the industry to be used as an in-app currency, meanwhile Monetas is also devloping its own array of games where MNTG will be used to trade or purchase in-game assets.
